creator: slaurent@apache.org
text: In the doc for the RemoteIpValve (http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/valve.html), the remoteIPHeader attribute is mentionned, but actually it should be remoteIpHeader (notice the lowercase "p") since the setter method is setRemoteIpHeader(..).

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the report. I've cleaned the code and the docs up for 7.0.x and that will be in 7.0.1 onwards. I have also proposed a patch to clean up 6.0.x.
Fixed in 6.0 in r958195 and will be in 6.0.28 onwards.
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
